title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.001
frontText: What PowerShell cmdlet allows you to add users to an Active Directory group?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.002
frontText: What application programming interface (API) supports the querying of information from several directory services, including DNS, Active Directory, and other LDAP sources?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.003
frontText: Which administrative tools are used primarily to manage Active Directory objects within a domain?
backText: Active Directory Users and Computers and Active Directory Administrative Center

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.004
frontText: What types of file can systems administrators and developers use to provide settings that can be configured from within the Group Policy Editor?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.005
frontText: What server role allows for single sign‐on (SSO)?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.006
frontText: What PowerShell cmdlet allows you to view one or more Active Directory computers?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.007
frontText: Which PowerShell cmdlet allows you to view the Active Directory fine‐grained password policies?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.008
frontText: Which PowerShell cmdlet is the only way that you can create a new Managed Service Account?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.009
frontText: What class address is 131.107.2.1 /16?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.010
frontText: You have to identify the IPv6 address of the computer. How can you do this?
backText: Use ipconfig, or from the network connection status, click Details.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.011
frontText: Administrators can use which PowerShell cmdlet to unlock an Active Directory account?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.012
frontText: Which feature of the Active Directory Users and Computers tool can be used to delegate permissions to an OU?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.013
frontText: Which Azure tool allows you to connect your on‐site domain to your Azure network for SSO?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.014
frontText: What is the subnet equivalent for /27?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.015
frontText: A systems administrator wants to restore the System State information to a Windows Server 2022 domain controller. Which boot option must they choose in order to restore the complete System State information?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.016
frontText: What server turns a hostname into an IP address?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.017
frontText: True or False: You cannot have a folder or file compressed and encrypted at the same time.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.018
frontText: Users are generally placed in _______ to simplify the management of permissions.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.019
frontText: A Windows Server 2022 computer that contains a copy of the Active Directory database is known as a(n) _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.020
frontText: What is a cloud‐based identity and access management service that can help you access external resources, such as Microsoft 365, the Azure portal, and other SaaS applications?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.021
frontText: Multiple Active Directory domains that do not share a common namespace can be joined together as _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.022
frontText: Multiple Active Directory domains that share a common namespace can be joined together as a(n) _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.023
frontText: Which utility is used to configure and manage hard disks?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.024
frontText: A Windows Server 2022 domain controller that contains a copy of the schema and a subset of information for all domains is known as a(n) _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.025
frontText: The data store that is responsible for storing security‐related information for all the domains within an Active Directory forest is known as the _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.026
frontText: Group Policy Objects can be connected to organizational units (OUs) through the use of what relationship?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.027
frontText: A child object receives the same permissions as a parent object within the Active Directory. This is known as _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.028
frontText: A collection of settings that apply to users and computers is known as a(n) _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.029
frontText: What utility is used to edit the Registry in Windows Server 2022?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.030
frontText: Replication between domain controllers in different sites is known as _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.031
frontText: What utility displays information about the hardware that is installed on your computer?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.032
frontText: What command is used to configure a Windows Server 2022 boot order?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.033
frontText: Which protocol is designed to access information stored in Active Directory and other types of directory services?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.034
frontText: A(n) _______ is an Active Directory object that specifies a collection of well‐connected subnets.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.035
frontText: Active Directory sites are made up of groupings of TCP/IP addresses known as _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.036
frontText: A Windows Server 2022 computer that is a member of an Active Directory domain but that does not contain a copy of the Active Directory data store is known as a(n) _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.037
frontText: In Windows Firewall, which inbound TCP port would you allow if you wanted to allow external users to authenticate by using ADFS?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.038

frontText: True or False: Windows Server 2008 R2 can be upgraded directly to Windows Server 2022?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.040
frontText: The structure that defines the types of objects supported by Active Directory is known as the _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.041
frontText: Pieces of information that describe the details related to Active Directory objects are known as _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.042
frontText: You need to identify the disk, memory, CPU, and network resources that an application is currently using. Which tool can you use?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.044
frontText: Which Windows Server 2022 MMC allows you to create Group Policy Objects (GPOs)?

frontText: You need to create a new server in Azure. How do you create a new server in Azure?

frontText: A systems administrator wants to view details about events that have occurred involving Active Directory. Which log in the Event Viewer should they examine?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.048
frontText: Which Windows Server 2022 feature allows you to create and run virtual machines?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.049
frontText: Before connecting your onsite network with Azure, you need to create which type of DNS record(s)?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.050
frontText: A logical connection between two or more Active Directory sites is known as a(n) _______.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.051
frontText: What type of DNS zone stores the DNS database in Active Directory?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.052
frontText: What is the CIDR equivalent to 255.255.240.0?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.053
frontText: You want to set up a cloud‐based Active Directory. What is the name of this type of Active Directory?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.054
frontText: What commands could you use to release and renew your computer’s DHCP configuration?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.055
frontText: Your service provider has assigned you the network address 192.168.154.0. You have been granted the entire range to use. What class of address have you been assigned?

frontText: What virtualization utility can you use to create a Windows Server 2022 testing and training environment?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.057
frontText: In what order are GPOs applied?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.058
frontText: You are the system administrator of a large organization that has recently decided to add an Azure AD subscription. Your boss has asked you about Azure security and making sure that user logins are secure. What feature can you explain to your boss to ease their concerns?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.059
frontText: You want to create a new Azure Active Directory policy for your users. What PowerShell cmdlet would you use to accomplish this task?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.060
frontText: You want your users to be able to reset passwords themselves. What Azure AD feature allows this to happen?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.061
frontText: You want to look at an Azure Active Directory application policy for your users’ applications. What PowerShell cmdlet would you use to accomplish this task?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.062
frontText: You want to change an Azure Active Directory policy for your users. What PowerShell cmdlet would you use to accomplish this task?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.063
frontText: When using conditional access policies, one section of the conditional access policy controls the who, what, and where of the conditional access policy. What section is being discussed?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.064
frontText: You are the network administrator for a company that has decided to start using Windows containers. You download the wrong image from Docker. What command allows you to delete an image?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.065
frontText: You want to create a new container. What command allows you to create a container?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.066
frontText: You have built a bunch of Docker containers. What PowerShell cmdlet allows you to view the containers?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.067
frontText: You need to build and use a Dockerfile. You need to compile and create an image using the Dockerfile. What command would you use?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.068
frontText: You need to build a new image using Windows Server Core. What command would you use to get a Windows Server Core image?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.069
frontText: You want to use PowerShell to setup a new NLB cluster. NLB is intended to distribute the load across multiple servers. What command would you use?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.070
frontText: True or False: Azure Load Balancer is one tool that is a network‐layer load balancer that improves network performance and availability of your applications.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.071
frontText: What is the maximum number of nodes that can participate in a Windows Server 2022 NLB single cluster?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.072
frontText: Which actions should be performed against an NLB cluster node if maintenance needs to be performed while not terminating current connections?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.073
frontText: Which actions should be performed against an NLB cluster node if maintenance needs to be performed and all connections must be terminated immediately?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.074
frontText: An administrator want to stop virtual machine replication. What PowerShell cmdlet would you use?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.075
frontText: To configure an NLB cluster with unicast, what is the minimum number of network adapters required in each node?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.076
frontText: What should you use if you want to view the available storage in a Storage Space Direct storage pool?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.077
frontText: Which two valid policies can be set to inform Azure File Sync when cool files should be tiered while enabling cloud tiering?
backText: Date policy and Disk Space policy

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.078
frontText: You are planning the data share migration to support the on‐premises migration plan. What should you use to perform the migration?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.079
frontText: Which category does Subscription Activation fall into in regard to deployment scenarios?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.080
frontText: There is a Microsoft tool that allows a Windows client computer to be set up with all applications and operating systems automatically without any administrator intervention. What is this called?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.081
frontText: You need to make sure that all Windows clients connected to Azure only run approved applications on all of these computers. What should you implement to ensure this?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.082
frontText: When enabling Windows Defender Credential Guard using Intune, what profile type should you use?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.083
frontText: What is the minimum amount of RAM that Microsoft recommends to use Microsoft Defender Application Guard?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.084
frontText: You are trying to set up your Windows Defender Firewall to allow DNS inbound and outbound rules. Which port number would you set up?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.085
frontText: True or False: Endpoint Detection and Response will detect, investigate, and respond to advanced threats.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.086
frontText: One section of Windows Security covers the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen settings and Exploit Protection mitigations. What section is being discussed?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.087
frontText: Which Intune built‐in role account can create the security baselines?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.088
frontText: True or False: With Endpoint Security Risks, drive‐by downloads is one of the possible risks when an attack uses an automated download of software to a device without the user’s consent.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.089
frontText: In Task Manager, which tab would you use to stop an application from running?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.090
frontText: What command‐line command would you type to start Performance Monitor?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.091
frontText: Which application can you use to see what users are currently connected to the server?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.092
frontText: What command‐line command would you type to start Resource Monitor?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.093
frontText: Which Azure tool will perform analytics, diagnostics, and monitoring?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.094
frontText: True or False: Single‐hop remoting is a PowerShell Remoting session and the term used when attempting to access a resource that is outside of that remote computer.
backText: False. Second‐hop remoting would be correct.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.095
frontText: True or False: The Task Manager tab called Details allows you to see what the processor’s affinity settings are.

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.096
frontText: What should you use in Microsoft Defender for Cloud if you want to automatically shut down the VM if Microsoft Defender for Cloud generates a security alert?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.097
frontText: In Azure Site Recovery Networking, all outbound traffic from the VM uses which IP address?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.098
frontText: Which two Azure Backup options require you to deploy Microsoft Azure Backup Server (MABS)?

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.099
frontText: Microsoft Defender for Cloud has two main pillars for cloud security; what are they?
backText: Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) and Cloud Workload Protection Platform (CWPP)

title: fc155415.WiSeSyAdCSG.100
frontText: You create a recovery plan in Azure Site Recovery to fail over all the VMs to an Azure region. The plan has three manual actions. What should you use if you need to replace one of the manual actions with an automated process?
